resources.string: To start your shift, you will need to allow the app to take your picture and access your location. Click the button below to begin by taking your photo.
To end your shift, you will need to allow the app to take your picture and access your location. Click the button below to begin by taking your photo.
Picture taken successfully! Next, tap the button below to allow the app to access your location.
Your location has successfully been retrieved with longitude %1$f and latitude %2$f. Click the button below to start your shift. Window will close.
Your location has successfully been retrieved with longitude %1$f and latitude %2$f. Click the button below to end your shift. Window will close.
Please grant the requested camera permissions.
Please grant the requested locations permissions.
Location access failed. Please try again.
